subject: Re: Re : [EVP-ITC] Re for Al: Ghost Box in a Faraday Cage type enclosu re
author: don powell
full_text:
--0-100425527-1226584731=:58495
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

I love this last line.

"What do we know for sure?"  One word, nothing.

This is not chemistry.  This is more like psychology or really more like religion.  There are **no**
proofs here.  Just theories and experiences... and the all important, beliefs :)

Don




________________________________
From: David Koenig <floridajakeblues@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, November 12, 2008 10:54:34 PM
Subject: Re: Re : [EVP-ITC] Re for Al: Ghost Box in a Faraday Cage type enclosu re


There are a few things that I can do as a Human.... But I Can't fit into a microwave oven. What would make you think that a Spirit could... or Would? Is that covered in Spirit 101 somewhere and I missed it?
Some Spirits can tell the future. Others can't. Some don't even know they've passed on. Others do.
I'd like to hear everyones expertise in the Spirit World.
What do you know for sure?
--0-100425527-1226584731=:58495
